00086    // Private inline methods.
00087 
00088    inline int RingOctaRebridgeMove::modId(int id, int n)
00089    {
00090       if (id >= n) id = id%n;
00091       if (id < 0) id = n - (-id)%n;
00092       return id;
00093    }
